text: Wa Dhari Al-Ladhina Attakhadhu Dinahum La`ibaan Wa Lahwan Wa Gharrat/humu Al-Hayaatu Ad-Dunya Wa Dhakkir Bihi 'An Tubsala Nafsun Bima Kasabat Laysa Laha Min Duni Allahi Wa Liyun Wa La Shafi`un Wa 'In Ta`dil Kulla `Adlin La Yu'ukhadh Minha 'Ula'ika Al-Ladhina 'Ubsilu Bima Kasabu Lahum Sharabun Min Hamimin Wa `Adhabun 'Alimun Bima Kanu Yakfuruna
